name: Reda Dahmani
title: Full-stack developper, Software developper
bio: I build and scale web application from concept to completion.
aboutme: Hi! I’m Reda, a passionate junior web developer currently training to become a full-stack developer. I enjoy building clean, responsive, and user-friendly websites that bring ideas to life. I’m constantly learning new technologies like React, Node.js, and JavaScript to improve my skills and create better experiences. I love solving problems and turning challenges into creative solutions. Outside of coding, I’m a big tech enthusiast who enjoys exploring peripherals, gaming setups, and sharing that passion online.
contactme: So are you ready to work with me ? If yes feel free to contact me !
